DOC.brief_summary: Randomized controlled trial of electronic cigarettes with nicotine, without nicotine, and sham control, on endothelial function and markers of oxidative stress.
DOC.detailed_description: Participants will use an electronic cigarette on 3 occasions: 1) with nicotine, 2) without nicotine, 3) sham control, and undergo a measure of endothelial function called brachial artery flow mediated dilatation (FMD). Additionally, oxidative stress will be measured pre and post exposure.
DOC.criteria: Healthy Cardiac disease Respiratory disease Diabetes mellitus
